results.name: Row sums of A128586.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Yüksel Soykan, Summing Formulas For Generalized Tribonacci Numbers, arXiv:1910.03490 [math.GM], 2019.
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-2,0,1).
formula: Row sums of triangle A128586, inverse binomial transform of A128588.
a(n+3) = (-1)^n * A001595(n) for all n>=0. - _M. F. Hasler_ and _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Sep 30 2009
program: (PARI) vector(40, n, f=fibonacci; (-1)^(n-1)*(2*f(n-2)-1)) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Jul 10 2019
(Sage) [(-1)^(n-1)*(2*fibonacci(n-2)-1) for n in (1..40)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Jul 10 2019
xref: This is a signed version of A001595. [_Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Sep 30 2009]
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Mar 11 2007
